alert.note: Alert for Dent; Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 3:43AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dent and northeastern Phelps Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 342 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Newburg, or 9 miles south of Rolla, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rolla... St. James... Lake Spring... Lecoma... Anutt... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 180 and 183, and between mile markers 188 and 197. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for east central Missouri.
